settings.option.simpleBorder.description: If enabled, uses a basic colored rectangle for selection. If disabled, uses the custom textured borders.
settings.option.8wayScan.description: Enable 8-way connectivity for the Field Scan. If disabled, only tiles directly up, down, left, or right are counted.
settings.option.countSelectedTiles.descr: Displays the total count of all tiles within the scanned or selected area.
settings.option.countHarvestableTiles.de: Counts how many crops are fully grown and ready for harvest.
settings.option.countDryTiles.descriptio: Counts how many tilled tiles currently need watering.
settings.option.countSeedableTiles.descr: Counts tilled tiles that are currently empty and ready for seeds.
settings.option.countDiggableTiles.descr: Counts untilled tiles that can be hoed (ignores occupied tiles).
settings.keybinds.scanLocation.descripti: calculates statistics for every tile in your current location.
settings.keybinds.scanConnected.descript: Triggers a scan starting from the selected tile to find all connected tilled tiles.
settings.keybinds.toggleSelectionMode.de: Enter or exit Selection Mode to manually select an area to scan.
settings.keybinds.selectTile.description: While in Selection Mode, use this to set your start and end points.
